tool.name: csplit

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
parameter_list.helptext:
Each PATTERN may be:

INTEGER - Copy up to but not including specified line number


/REGEXP/[OFFSET] - Copy up to but not including a matching line


%REGEXP%[OFFSET] - Skip to, but not including a matching line


A line OFFSET is a required ‘+’ or ‘-’ followed by a positive integer.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Supply a sprintf format string to use as the suffix format instead of %02d.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Do not remove output files on errors.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Use specified number of digits instead of 2.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
parameter_list.helptext:
Optional number indicating how may times the PATTERN should be repeated.

{INTEGER} - Repeat the previous pattern specified number of times


{*} - Repeat the previous pattern as many times as possible

tool.description: Split a file into sections determined by context lines.
